action.description: The committee(s) on WAM recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED.  The votes in WAM were as follows: 10 Aye(s): Senator(s) Dela Cruz, Moriwaki, Aquino, Elefante, Hashimoto, Inouye, Kanuha, Kidani, Lee, C., Fevella; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 3 Excused: Senator(s) DeCoite, Kim, Wakai.
